<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108443</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105831</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">It's Alive! Bringing History to Life by Creating Hands-On Museum Exhibits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es Ist Lebendig! Holen von von Geschichte 
zum Leben durch das Erstellen Hand-Auf Museum Ausstellungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il Est Vivant ! Apporter l'histoire à la 
vie en créant Main-Sur des objets exposés de musée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Está Viva! Trazendo o history à vida 
criando Mão- em exibições do museu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È Vivo! Portando storia alla vita creando 
Mano- sulle esposizioni del museo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι ζωντανό! Φέρνοντας ιστορία στη ζωή με τη 
δημιουργία των εμπράγματων εκθεμάτων μουσείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Está Viva! Traer historia a la vida 
creando Mano-En objetos expuestos del museo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will create proposals for hands-on, interactive and/or multimedia museum exhibits that bring different historical figures, eras, events, groups, or movements to life.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erstellen Kursteilnehmer 
Anträge für die Blindeinschub, interaktive und/oder Multimediamuseum
Ausstellungen, die unterschiedliche historische Abbildungen, Ären, 
Fälle, Gruppen oder Bewegungen zum Leben holen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants créeront des 
propositions pour les objets exposés à commande manuelle, 
interactifs et/ou de multimédia de musée qui apportent différents 
figures, ères, événements, groupes, ou mouvements historiques à la
vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes criarão propostas 
para as exibições hands-on, interativas e/ou dos multimedia do museu
que trazem figuras, eras, eventos, grupos, ou movimentos históricos 
diferentes à vida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi creeranno le 
proposte di esposizioni hands-on, interattive e/o di multimedia del 
museo che portano le figure, le ere, gli eventi, i gruppi, o i 
movimenti storici differenti a vita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν τις 
προτάσεις για τα εκθέματα εμπράγματων, διαλογικών ή/και μουσείων
πολυμέσων που φέρνουν τους διαφορετικές ιστορικές αριθμούς, τις 
εποχές, τα γεγονότα, τις ομάδες, ή τις μετακινήσεις στη ζωή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes crearán las 
ofertas para los objetos expuestos con manos, interactivos y/o de las 
multimedias del museo que traen diversos figuras, eras, 
acontecimientos, grupos, o movimientos históricos a la vida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105831</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108443</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
